attributes.additional_details: Media Literacy is chiefly concerned with increasing awareness of the countless forms of media messages encountered in everyday life and in helping people to recognise how media influences personal choice, filters perceptions and beliefs and shapes popular culture. VoxFemme's campaign for an annual National Media Literacy Week during which media educators, activists and producers  coalesce effort and output to engage local communities, schools and society in general, in thinking more critically about the content and impact of media and towards being more judicious consumers of media output.
